comment: I was a bit disappointed with this course. The individual work was easy and the tests were straight forward but the group projects shot me in the foot. I hope whoever takes her place will set up a more fair system for future students. Peer Evaluations were half your grade for each project. If you get a bad group, kiss your A goodbye.
Great professor. Took her online. If you do your work and turn it in on time, you should make an A.
She is a good teacher but her classes are going to be difficult because she asks a lot. She assigns a lot of work that seems unnecessary to the class. Be prepared to over-achieve.

She is probably the nicest, most helpful professor I've ever had. She is willing to go out of her way so her students do well. Her approach to teaching is enthusiastic and she always keeps the students engaged with funny stories that relate to the class material. Definitely take her!

I appreciated that most everything was straight forward in terms of graded activities.  The assignments were varied enough and the tests were an adequate assessment of our knowledge.  The classroom time was usually very enjoyable. Only complaint: Some test questions seemed obscure or unnecessary in terms of the course as a whole.  Great prof!

Great teacher! She cares about the class, you as a person, and how well you do. If you dont understand, she will take time out of her own schedule to help you. Shes so happy all the time. She made a subject I hated into my favorite class. The quizzes are easy if you read the book. Tests arent hard and its easy to pass the class if you just attentio

She's very passionate about what she teaches and though the class can get boring sometimes, it's still enjoyable. She has online quizzes that you can take an unlimited amount of times and takes the highest grade. You don't have to read the textbook, but I recommend it anyway. A few tests, a couple assignments. Easy A as long as you do the work.

Great prof! Super nice and very helpful. Some work involved: 6 assignments throughout semester (career fairs, resume review, etc.) quiz every week, 3 tests-which were a little hard. Do all of the assignments and you will be ok. She really wants you to do well and achieve your business goals. Would recommend her!

She is very nice indeed but her tests are like "whoa where does this come from?"  She uses both powerpoints and the text, and its not just main terms, little details have to be memorized. There are reading quizzes every week and a bunch of assignments.  She's nice enough but i'd look elsewhere if you're taking this class.
Such a great teacher!  I would recommend her to all!
Really boring, she lectures everyday. If you do all of the assignments you can pass with a B even if you don't do good on tests.

She is a very nice professor.. I would recommend you take her because she knows the field very well and cares about your grade. Class is a little on the boring side. Make sure you take all the quizes, do the assignments, and study for the tests. You have to work to earn your grade but it is not too bad.

She is VERY experienced in the field and teaches from experience.  Enthusiasic and makes the material relevant and applicable.  I really liked her as a teacher and she seemes genuinely interested in me as a student and as a person.  You have to read and study to do well but she is entertaining enough to make you want to read and participate

She was GREAT!  I took her for a may-mester class. She made the material interesting and used lots of real-life, relevent examples.  Tests are not too tough and she offers extra credit opportunities.  Definetely take her!
There is never a dull moment in class.  Her energy will feed yours even on your lowest day.  This light heartedness in her makes me wanna learn!
